div.div: Carroll University vs. Lake Forest College
at Lake Forest, Ill. | Farwell Field

tr.td: Carroll wins coin toss and will receive and defend west end zone.
Donnie Caldwell kickoff 47 yards to the CU23, Tim Losby return 9 yards to the CU32, fumble forced by Aidan Price, fumble by Tim Losby recovered by CU Evan James at CU43.
Joe Beckstrand rush for 3 yards to the CU46 (John Dillon).
Ryan Young pass incomplete to Matt Sklander (Luke Butts).
Ryan Young pass complete to CJ Wellington for 14 yards to the LFC40, 1ST DOWN CU (Darrius McKay).
Ryan Young pass complete to CJ Wellington for 7 yards to the LFC33 (NicholausWaters).
Joe Beckstrand rush for 5 yards to the LFC28, 1ST DOWN CU (John Dillon).
Ryan Young pass complete to CJ Wellington for 7 yards to the LFC21 (Darrius McKay).
Ryan Young pass complete to Matt Sklander for 11 yards to the LFC10, 1ST DOWN CU (NicholausWaters).
Ryan Young pass complete to Matt Sklander for loss of 2 yards to the LFC12 (Jordan Cruz).
Joe Beckstrand rush for 1 yard to the LFC11 (Dylan Burke).
Ryan Young pass incomplete to Matt Sklander.
Tyler Raymaker field goal attempt from 28 GOOD, clock 10:29.
Sean Kivlin kickoff 50 yards to the LFC20, Darrius McKay return 56 yards to the CU24 (Robert Mulligan).
